Articles.Content: THought it would be nice to have a random small chance (and danger) of random meteors falling in from space and lay on the ground on bodies with no atmosphere, that can be picked up and placed in a box (think extraplanetary launchpad recyclers) for science points and carted back to kerbin. would require some kind of collection part (to pick them up) like a bucket or something, with a hinge.
Sounds similar in mechanics to [Koins](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106305-Koins%21-Gather-funds-from-the-environment) (collecting generated items from the environment)
